text: The Japan Women's Sevens is an annual women's rugby sevens tournament, currently hosted in Kitakyushu as one of the stops on the World Rugby Women's Sevens Series. Japan joined for the fifth edition of the series. The tournament is played at the Mikuni World Stadium. ==Champions== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; width: 100%; text-align: center;" |- ! style="width:3em; padding:2px;"| Year !
